item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @xjadefighter xjadefighter
item.description:
@xjadefighter wrote:

Ok this is the error

client.java:6292: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pkPoints location: class client if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { ^ client.java:6294: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pkPoints location: class client pkPoints -= TotPrice2; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

and heres the code

if (MyShopID == 44) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0){ pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough PK points for this item."); } }
